speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Gunnar Hökmark, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on State aid reform 2005-2009 ( 2005/2165(INI) ) ( A6-0009/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Gunnar Hökmark, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on State aid reform 2005-2009 ( 2005/2165(INI) ) ( A6-0009/2006 ).
